data.title: The Mathematics of Magic: The Enchanter Stories of L. Sprague De Camp and Fletcher Pratt
data.meta_description: The Mathematics of Magic: The Enchanter Stories of L. Sprague De Camp and Fletcher Pratt by Olson, Mark L. - ISBN 10: 1886778655 - ISBN 13: 9781886778658 - Nesfa Pr - 2007 - Hardcover
data.text:
The Mathematics of Magic (L. Sprague De Camp)

L. Sprague de Camp

Published by Brand: NESFA Press, 2007

ISBN 10: 1886778655 / ISBN 13: 9781886778658

Used / Hardcover

Quantity: 1 available

Seller: Ergodebooks, Houston, TX, U.S.A.

Seller Rating:

Hardcover. Condition: Good. Harold Shea is a psychologist who dreams of adventure, but never gets beyond learning to fence and occasionally showing up at staff meetings dressed in horseback riding garb. But when he learns that his boss, Dr. Reed Chalmers, has developed a theory which allows a person to transport himself to any world he can imagine, Harold Shea decides to give it a whirl. This volume includes all the De Camp and Pratt Enchanter stories. Seller Inventory # SONG1886778655

Contact seller
